text: Adrián Salvador Galarza González (born 25 December 1965) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing San Luis Potosí. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:People from San Luis Potosí Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Adrián Salvador Galarza González
